name: Brew It!
description:
A project I am currently working on.

2 players take the roles of Alchemists in a  Alchemy shop, making sure to satisfy the needs of their customer.

Goal:

Every time you get a new order, grind your ingredients and try to use your Color Theory skills, to combine the colors in such way, that creates the desired potion.

Controls:

Player1: 
Move: WSAD
Pickup: E
Use Grinder: Q

Player2:
Move: Arrows
Pickup: L
Use Grinder: K
